languages.text: Стеклянная призма, изготовленная культистами Последнего восхода, принадлежала их предводительнице Заре. Если смотреть сквозь нее достаточно долго, то взгляд начинает обманывать разум, показывая не то, что есть на самом деле, но то, что могло бы быть.

A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It belonged to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing what could be instead of what is.
languages.original_text: Стеклянная призма, изготовленная культистами Последнего восхода, принадлежала их предводительнице Заре. Если смотреть сквозь нее достаточно долго, то взгляд начинает обманывать разум, показывая не то, что есть на самом деле, но то, что могло бы быть.

traits.locale_text: A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It used to belong to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing it what could be instead of what is.

A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It used to belong to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing it what could be instead of what is.

A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It belonged to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing what could be instead of what is.

A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It belonged to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing what could be instead of what is.

A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It belonged to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing what could be instead of what is.

languages.text: Ein Glasprisma, das von den Kultisten der Letzten Dämmerung gefertigt wurde. Es gehörte ihrer Anführerin, Aurora. Wenn du lange genug hindurchsiehst, beginnen deine Augen deinen Verstand zu täuschen und zeigen dir nicht mehr, was ist, sondern was sein könnte.
languages.original_text: A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It belonged to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing what could be instead of what is.

traits.locale_text: Ein Glasprisma, das von den Kultisten der Letzten Dämmerung gefertigt wurde. Es gehörte ihrer Anführerin, Aurora. Wenn du lange genug hindurchsiehst, beginnen deine Augen deinen Verstand zu täuschen und zeigen dir nicht mehr, was ist, sondern was sein könnte.

languages.text: Prisme de verre fabriqué par les fidèles de l'Aube finale et appartenant à Aurore, leur cheffe. Si vous regardez suffisamment longtemps à travers, votre vision commence à tromper votre esprit, vous montrant ce qui pourrait être au lieu de ce qui est.
languages.original_text: A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It belonged to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing what could be instead of what is.

traits.locale_text: Prisme de verre fabriqué par les fidèles de l'Aube finale et appartenant à Aurore, leur cheffe. Si vous regardez suffisamment longtemps à travers, votre vision commence à tromper votre esprit, vous montrant ce qui pourrait être au lieu de ce qui est.

languages.text: “终末黎明”邪教制作的玻璃棱镜，曾属于他们的首领“极光”。如果透过棱镜看得太久，你的眼睛就会开始欺骗你的大脑，让你看到扭曲的幻觉，而不是事物原本的样子。
languages.original_text: A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It belonged to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing what could be instead of what is.

traits.locale_text: “终末黎明”邪教制作的玻璃棱镜，曾属于他们的首领“极光”。如果透过棱镜看得太久，你的眼睛就会开始欺骗你的大脑，让你看到扭曲的幻觉，而不是事物原本的样子。

languages.text: 最後の夜明け魔女団が作ったガラスのプリズム。彼らのリーダーであるオーロラの所有物だ。しばらく眺めていると、自身のビジョンが心を惑わせ、あるべき姿ではなく、そのものの姿を見せてくる。
languages.original_text: A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It belonged to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing what could be instead of what is.

traits.locale_text: 最後の夜明け魔女団が作ったガラスのプリズム。魔女団のリーダーであるオーロラの所有物だ。しばらく眺めていると、自身のビジョンが心を惑わせて、あるべき姿ではなく、そのものの姿を見せてくる。

languages.text: Un prisma de cristal fabricado por los cultistas del Amanecer Final. Pertenecía a su líder, Aurora. Si miras a través de él el tiempo suficiente, tu vista empieza a engañar a tu mente, mostrando lo que podría ser en lugar de lo que es.
languages.original_text: A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It belonged to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing what could be instead of what is.

traits.locale_text: Un prisma de cristal fabricado por los cultistas del Amanecer Final. Pertenecía a su líder, Aurora. Si miras a través de él el tiempo suficiente, tu vista empieza a engañar a tu mente, mostrando lo que podría ser en lugar de lo que es.

languages.text: Nihai Şafak tarikatçılarının imal ettiği bu cam prizma, liderleri Aurora'ya aitti. İçinden yeteri kadar süre bakarsan gördüklerin beynini aldatmaya başlar; olanı değil, olabilecekleri gösterir.
languages.original_text: A glass prism crafted by the cultists of the Final Dawn. It belonged to their leader, Aurora. If you look through it long enough, your vision begins to deceive your mind, showing what could be instead of what is.

traits.locale_text: Nihai Şafak tarikatçileri tarafından üretilmiş bir cam prizma. Liderleri Aurora'ya aitti. İçinden yeteri kadar süre bakarsan gördüklerin beynini aldatmaya başlar; olanı değil, olabilecekleri gösterir.
